item.title: Maya, Book 3, The Hike Bedtime-Story.com
item.description:
Maya, Book 3, The Hike Bedtime-Story.com

Maya Book III - The Hike This tale is a marvelous Learning Adventure. Many of the wonderful illustrations are clickable to display actual photographs. Underlined words are clickable as well. Enjoy! Luke Winstead knelt to pat the head of a small reddish brown and white puppy who was bouncing about in his sister's lap as she relaxed on the cool green grass.

item.title: Maya - Book II, The Dream, by Rich Okun, at Bedtime-Story.com
item.description:
Maya - Book II, The Dream, by Rich Okun, at Bedtime-Story.com

Maya Book II - The Dream Crystal awoke in a rush, rubbing her eyes and looking around for Maya. She found her at the foot of the bed, all stretched out; her warm, furry little body was molded tightly against Crystal's legs. Crystal let out a sigh of relief, and with a contented smile, she lay back down.

item.title: MAYA, by Rich Okun, at BEDTIME-STORY.COM
item.description:
MAYA, by Rich Okun, at BEDTIME-STORY.COM

Bedtime-Story For the Busy Business-Parent Whimsical Bedtime Stories for Children of All AgesFeeling very dizzy, faster, spinning ever faster on the ground, arms up-reaching and out-stretched to that big open sky. http://www.Bedtime-Story.com Maya "Olly Olly Oxen Free," in fine musical tone. "Olly Olly Oxen Free." Luke couldn't find his sister.
